summary: "TAKATA RECALL"  I RECEIVED A SAFETY RECALL NOTICE FROM FORD MC BACK IN JULY OF 2016. ITS BEEN ALMOST A YEAR AND THIS INCREDIBLY DANGEROUS DEFECT HAS STILL NOT BEEN RESOLVED. ARE THEY JUST WAITING TO SEE HOW MANY PEOPLE DIE AND AMOUNT OF LAWSUITS VERSES THE COST OF JUST FIXING THE ISSUE? AS THE AMERICAN PEOPLES SAFETY ORGANIZATION, YOU SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWING THIS SAFETY ISSUE TO STILL BE GOING. OUR LIVES DO MATTER. PLEASE HANDLE THIS ISSUE IMMEDIATELY.
